name: A Bloody Escape
description:
It's a full moon and your blood boils. The transformation has already begun and soon you will lose all control over your body. To protect your friends and family, you need to leave the town immediately.

How to play

Your goal is to get out of the city by reaching one of the two gates. When you approach other villagers you start to lose control over your character, who will run after the villagers and kill them. After some time, the transformation will decline and you will regain more control over your character. Try to evade the villagers as much as possible.

Known bugs

Toilets: Toilets were supposed to be hideouts where the player can wait for the transformation to decline, but it is not always possible to enter correctly.

Other

All models (except human characters) where created during the jam with blender.
